edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an instance of the game. It keeps track of the grid and everything in the grid.

    • Field Summary

      This object in GameEngine will hold the location of all entities in the game including consumables, level, and lives.

      (package private) UserInterface userInput

    • Field Detail

      • grid

        Grid grid
        This object in GameEngine will hold the location of all entities in the game including consumables, level, and lives.

      • userInput

        UserInterface userInput
        This object in GameEngine creates the user input to display the board to the user and prompts for user input.

      • playerX

        int playerX
        This field holds the value for player location. This field is set by runGame() and ninjaKill().

      • playerY

        int playerY
        This field holds the value for player location. This field is set by runGame() and ninjaKill().

      • action

        SpyVsNinja.playerAct action
        This field hold the action from the user. This field is edited by startGame() and runGame()

      • direction

        SpyVsNinja.EntityDirec direction
        This field hold the player direction to be used in GameEngine. This field is edited by startGame() as a default value and userAction() changes the value for use in the game.

      • gameOver

        boolean gameOver
        This field tells the game to stop running and go back to main menu. This field starts true. This is edited by startGame(), ninjaKill(), and userAction().

      • debug

        boolean debug
        This field changes the game mode to debug mode. This field is default false and is edited by userAction().

      • hardmode

        boolean hardmode
        This field changes the game mode to hard mode. This field is default false and is edited by userAction().

      • gameRunning

        boolean gameRunning
        This field tells the game to stop running at the end of the level. This field starts true. This is edited by startGame() and playerMoves().

      • lives

        int lives
        These fields hold the current value of consumables. These are edited by updateConsumables()

      • ammo

        int ammo
        These fields hold the current value of consumables. These are edited by updateConsumables()

      • invuln

        int invuln
        These fields hold the current value of consumables. These are edited by updateConsumables()

      • level

        int level
        These fields hold the current value of consumables. These are edited by updateConsumables()

      • maxLevel

        int maxLevel
        This field tells the game engine the max possible level the player can reach. default 15

      • playerWins

        boolean playerWins
        This field is used to determine if the player has won the game.

      • exit

        boolean exit
        This field is used when the player wants to exit the game. To exit, this value is set to true.

      • load

        boolean load
        This field is used when the player wants to load a saved game. To load, this value is set to true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine()

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method is used to initialize an instance of the game.

      • runGame

        private void runGame()
        This method is used to run the game once initialized. It checks for player deaths, lets the user take his turn, and updates the user interface.

      • updateEntity

        public void updateEntity()
        This method is used to update Entity locations on the grid.

      • ninjaKill

        private void ninjaKill()
        This method checks every ninja to see if the player is adjacent to them. If the player is adjacent the ninja kills them.

      • playerLooks

        public void playerLooks()
        This method is used when the player wishes to look in a direction on the grid. It reveals 2 tiles in the chosen direction when called.

      • playerShoots

        public void playerShoots()
        This method checks to see if a ninja is in direction of gun being fired. It checks from user position to the end of the grid. The direction (north) 0, (east) 1, (south) 2, and (west) 3.

      • userAction

        private void userAction()
        This method is determined by player input. It is used to take player action, in addition to providing access to debug and hard mode.

      • updateUserInterface

        private void updateUserInterface()
        This method is used to update the user interface. This includes items such as the grid, number of lives, and powerups.

      • playerMoves

        private void playerMoves()
        This method is used to determine player movement. It first checks to make sure the player can move to the specified space, then moves him there if it is safe. If the player attempts to move onto the document, it will move to the next level.

      • save

        private void save()
        This method is used to save an instance of the game to a file. The user must input a name for the file.

      • load

        private void load()
        This method is used to load an instance of the game from a file. The user must input the name of said file.

      • updateConsumables

        private void updateConsumables()
        This method is used to update the player's current consumables.
